resources.string: Swipe for info, tap to skip…

This app is designed to easily help users find anagrams, subwords, or word combinations that can be made from a set of letters. You could find an anagram of your name or other things, or use it as an aid for crosswords or games like Words With Friends(TM), or Scrabble(TM)…

To find anagrams, simply type the letters of names, or words you are curious about. For games like Scrabble(TM) or Words With Friends(TM), just enter your letters in no specific order in the search bar and Word Sleuth will do the work for you…

Sub-words are words that can be made with the letters provided. They are not full anagrams. Finding subwords is easy with Word Sleuth. They will appear in a list to view when a query is submitted, along with anagrams, and combinations, if any are found…
Word combinations are simply multiple word anagrams that match a user\'s query. For example a word combination anagram for \"Word Sleuth\" is \"Slower Thud\"…

Sometimes you don\'t know all the letters for a query , or when you have blank tiles in a game. You can substitute unknown letters with the "*" wildcard character and Word Sleuth will do the heavy lifting to find matches…

Word Sleuth is great for crosswords too. If you know the order of the word, you can enter unknown letters by using the character \"-\". Say you were playing a crossword puzzle, and you enter \"h-ll-\", Word Sleuth will return \"hello\" along with all other possibilities.
To search, enter your query in the search bar above. Click on the icon to expand. Type \"*\" for wildcards.
To search, enter your query in the search bar above. Click on the icon to expand. Type \"*\" for wildcards.
Would you like to disable introduction help on app start?
Did this app help you with finding cool anagrams or word combos? Please rate WordSleuth.
